venueName: Campground at James Island County Park

pages.text: Skip to Main Content Home Festivals & Events Festivals & Events Slip on your favorite dancing shoes and get ready for fun! Treat your taste buds, celebrate your heritage, and make the most of your weekends. From magical starry nights at summer reggae concerts to lively bluegrass jams, crawfish-eating contests, family camping trips, and scenic 5K trail runs, there’s something for everyone. With a year packed full of festivals and events in your county parks, the possibilities for fun are endless. Come out and explore all the ways you can live life to the fullest! Sat, Jan 24 Fairy House Day Sat, Feb 7 Save the Light Half Marathon & 5K Run/Walk Sat, Feb 21 Senior Sneaker Dance Sat, Feb 28 Senior Sneaker Dance Sat, Mar 7 Where the Wild Things Run Sun, Mar 8 Palmetto Park Jam Thu, Mar 12 Toast Under the Oaks Sat, Mar 14 - Sun, Mar 15 Family Camp Jam Sat, Mar 21 Birds of a Feather Thu, Apr 2 Toast Under the Oaks Mon, Apr 13 Golf Tournament Fundraiser Sat, Apr 18 Lowcountry Cajun Festival Fri, Apr 24 Dancing on the Cooper Wed, Apr 29 Yappy Hour Fri, May 1 Moonlight Mixer Fri, May 15 Dancing on the Cooper Fri, Jun 5 Moonlight Mixer Fri, Jun 12 Dancing on the Cooper Thu, Jun 18 Yoga Fest Fri, Jul 24 Dancing on the Cooper Fri, Jul 31 Moonlight Mixer Fri, Aug 21 Moonlight Mixer Fri, Sep 11 Dancing on the Cooper Fri, Sep 18 Moonlight Mixer Sat, Sep 26 Birds of a Feather Sun, Oct 4 Latin American Festival Sat, Nov 7 Harvest Festival View All Upcoming Events /Calendar.aspx We reserve the right to use photos or videos taken of visitors at our facilities or during our events and programs for publicity purposes. Always lock your vehicles and remove valuables from view, we are not responsible for lost, damaged or stolen property. Fees and hours are subject to change. Skip to Main Content 871 Riverland Dr.Charleston, SC 29412 843-795-4386 Email Directions Make Your Reservation Now Rules & Regulations Campground Site Map (PDF) Campground Photo Gallery Cottages Photo Gallery Home Our Parks Camping & Lodging Camping & Lodging With the and at James Island County Park, it has never been more convenient to explore historic Charleston and the Lowcountry. Come discover our history, charm, fine dining, antiques, plantations, parks, and sandy beaches. Just minutes from all of these attractions is your private retreat within the 643-acre James Island County Park.
